definition: presumptuously seeking success or a position in a new locality, traveling bag made of carpet
details:
adjective
- presumptuously seeking success or a position in a new locality
= example: presumptuously seeking success or a position in a new locality
= synonyms: carpetbagging
- following the practices or characteristic of carpetbaggers
= example: following the practices or characteristic of carpetbaggers
noun
- traveling bag made of carpet
